Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Are you ready for a jam-packed summary of what our people are buzzing about? Federal Treasurer Jim Chalmers has been on an economic mission rubbing shoulders with top officials in the US to prepare for the upcoming Federal Budget. It sounds like the trip was worth it because reports say he has a clearer picture of the challenges ahead. What's more we've learned that the treasurer will be announcing a significant overhaul of the country's tax and welfare system. Stay tuned because it's all happening!
